Too bad there weren’t any.

articles.author: Mark Lazerus, Scott Powers
articles.title: Blackhawks 'lay an egg' in home opener, get booed off the ice: 12 observations on another demoralizing defeat - The Athletic
articles.description: A defensive gaffe here and a turnover there were all it took. After looking good for two periods, they looked utterly defeated in the third.
articles.content: The Blackhawks have been waiting to play in front of a packed United Center crowd for 19 months, and more than 20,000 people packed the arena for Tuesday night’s home opener, showering a returning Jo… [+1119 chars]
